name: Complex Interfaces UI Kit
description:
A free and complete UI toolkit to easily create and custom complex interfaces for desktop


Easy to customize and to take in hand, it will help you in your projects with a lot of components and variants.


Non-exhaustive list of components:

- CTA

- Text fields and text areas

- Select and multi-select

- Accordions

- Modals and dialogs

- Sliders and range sliders

- Toasts

- Tooltips

- Progress bars

- Status badges

- Infobox

- Toggle, checkboxes etc.


Please share feedbacks and do not hesitate to ask for components / corrections on social networks or comments.
